statements: SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT age, satisfaction_score FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_scores ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE age <= 40;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC, income ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, satisfaction_score FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC, gender DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE gender = 'F' AND satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income, satisfaction_score FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE gender = 'M' AND age < 50 ORDER BY income ASC, satisfaction_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT pattern_name AS Name, pattern_description AS Description FROM satisfaction_patterns;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE satisfaction_score BETWEEN 4 AND 5;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE satisfaction_score > 80 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM satisfaction_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, satisfaction_score FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, location, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, quantity, amount FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_name, amount FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerDemographics JOIN CustomerFeedback ON CustomerDemographics.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT location, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT pattern_type FROM patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, income FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.location = 'New York';
SELECT pattern_type, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_count FROM patterns GROUP BY pattern_type HAVING total_count > 2 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT name, age, score FROM customers c JOIN satisfaction_scores s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.score > 4 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT pattern_type, location, income FROM patterns p LEFT JOIN demographics d ON p.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE p.pattern_type = 'geometric';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, satisfaction_score FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, marital_status, employment_status FROM demographics WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor's Degree';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, gender, age, location, satisfaction_score FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, location, satisfaction_score FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location, satisfaction_score FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 AND satisfaction_score < 5 ORDER BY age, satisfaction_score DESC;

SELECT customer_name, age, location, satisfaction_score FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE demographics.income > 50000 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC, age ASC;
